choices: A body part of terror toad
1.content: You are watch your favorite show mighty morphing power rangers. when a bright flash of light happens and you are in a open field and you see your favorite monster terror toad. He then walks up to you. He asks you who you are. You tell him you are [insert name here] he then says let’s do something fun. You say ok. He tells you he is going to turn you into a inanimate object. He then touchs you with his tongue. You black out and when you wake up you can’t move. What have you become?
1.title: Meeting terror toad

info.description:
You meet terror toad from power rangers and get turned into a inanimate object.
(Rules)
#1 stay with the story
#2dont get too toxic
#3 no death of the main character
